quotes: He abolished this 10% tax band in his last budget in 2007 to reduce the basic rate from 22% to 20%, increasing tax for 5 million people
Brown also implemented the Windfall Tax in 1997 on the privatised utilities.
According to the OECD, UK taxation increased from a 39.3% share of gross domestic product in 1997 to 42.4% in 2006, going to a higher level than that of Germany.
Brown's 2000 Spending Review outlined a major expansion of government spending, particularly on health and education.
In his April 2002 budget, Brown increased National Insurance to pay for health spending.

organizations.name: Institute for Fiscal Studies
quotes: according to the calculations of the Institute for Fiscal Studies, leaving those earning between £5,000 and £18,000 as the biggest losers.

organizations.name: OECD
quotes: According to the OECD, UK taxation increased from a 39.3% share of gross domestic product in 1997 to 42.4% in 2006, going to a higher level than that of Germany.

roles.title: chancellor
quotes: in his last budget as chancellor, Brown gave an extra £3 billion in pension allowances, an increase in the child tax credit, and an increase in the working tax credit.
